message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. We understand the significance of this investment and are excited to offer it to you at a carefully considered price of $1,200,000. This offer represents an excellent chance for you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information.
